Class TeamScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipi.dii.lsmsd.pokeMongo.userInterface.PokeScene

          • it.unipi.dii.lsmsd.pokeMongo.userInterface.TeamScene

  • public class TeamScene
extends PokeSceneWithHeaderAndBackButton
    This class is used to display the Node concerning the Team.
